body:
English for this is:
https://hentainexus.com/view/5725
The Prequel is:
https://hentainexus.com/view/5165
So she was kind of a typical NTR wife and cheater in the first one. She actually wanted to have the affair so I kind of feel she was worse than the blackmailed women in typical NTR. At the same time her husband was kind of brusque and neglected her, but not enough to warrant an affair. She got pregnant with the other guy’s kid. We’re left to assume that the husband discovered the adultery and divorced her and she was left with nothing, hence her current apartment compared to her previously nice place. Baby daddy also doesn’t stick around, considering it’s Japan, he probably got fired. They take cheating extremely seriously there, you lose your job. So this is the sequel and she’s kind of suffering for her actions. But it’s funny how she turns to sex to solve her problems even in the sequel. But I guess she learned her lesson from how her life was ruined.
